Title: Directs the commissioner of health to seek a waiver from the federal government to authorize undocumented immigrants to purchase unsubsidized health insurance through the New York State of Health Marketplace
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to seek a waiver from the federal government to authorize undocumented immigrants to purchase unsubsidized health insurance through the New York State of Health Marketplace.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the commissioner of health to seek a waiver from the federal government in relation to authorizing undocumented immigrants to purchase unsubsidized health insurance through the New York state of health marketplace
